description: The OR_LOG_POSTOP_NOTE table contains post-op notes from the log record.

columns.name: LOG_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the log record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: POSTOP_NOTES_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the post-op notes associated with this log.
